items.title: Tesla launches robotaxi rides in Austin with no human safety driver
items.summary: Not all of Tesla's fleet in Austin will be fully driverless. Per Tesla's AI lead Ashok Elluswamy, the company will be "starting with a few unsupervised vehicles mixed in with the broader robotaxi fleet with safety monitors, and the ratio will increase over time."

items.title: Meta seeks to limit evidence in child safety case
items.summary: Meta is set to go on trial in New Mexico for allegedly failing to protect minors. The company is requesting a broad swath of information not be allowed to be presented in court.

items.title: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
items.summary: The vessel, named Grinch, was stopped by the French navy as it travelled through waters between Spain and Morocco.

items.title: Google now offers free SAT practice exams, powered by Gemini
items.summary: Students can prompt Gemini by typing "I want to take a practice SAT test,” and the AI will provide them with a free practice exam. Gemini then analyzes the results, highlighting strengths and identifying areas that need further review. It also offers detailed explanations for any incorrect answers.

items.title: Standout corduroy design headlines this sweatshirt down at $22.50 (Reg. $28)

Buy for $22.50 (Reg. $28)

What we love

These days I’m a bit more choosy about the styles I buy, often waiting until I find something a bit unique that will stand out from the crowd. From my perspective, this sweatshirt certainly fits the bill, and it’s currently on sale.

items.title: HP’s 16-inch 3K OLED OmniBook 2-in-1 Copilot+ laptop with 32GB RAM/2TB SSD is $430 off today at $1,100
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Best Buy that drops HP’s 3K OLED OmniBook 2-in-1 Copilot+ laptop powered by Intel’s Core Ultra 9 Lunar Lake processor down to $1,099.99 shipped. You are looking at a specced-out variant of this notebook that regularly goes for $1,530, so that’s a straight-up $430 discount and one of the lowest we’ve tracked for it yet. This notebook briefly hit $1,000 a couple of months back during the Black Friday sale, and it’s now within $100 of that price. Best Buy also has a variant of this laptop with an Intel Core Ultra 7 processor down at $999.99 shipped with a $350 discount on its usual going rate. They both have a 2-in-1 form factor with a touch screen, and you can learn more about them in detail below.

more…

items.title: Yelp acquires Hatch, which charges a monthly fee for AI-powered agents that can respond to customer inquiries and make appointments, for $300M (Laura Mandaro/The Information)
items.summary:
Laura Mandaro / The Information:
Yelp acquires Hatch, which charges a monthly fee for AI-powered agents that can respond to customer inquiries and make appointments, for $300M  —  Recommendation app Yelp on Wednesday said it agreed to acquire AI agent startup Hatch for $300 million, or roughly 12 times the startup's annual recurring revenue.

items.title: German nurse jailed for murders could be linked to 100 more deaths
items.summary: Prosecutors are reviewing dozens more suspected deaths linked to a former palliative care nurse.

items.title: Save up to 42% on three BougeRV bike carriers that hold up to 200 pounds – all at lows starting from $160
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, BougeRV is offering the lowest prices we have tracked on three of its tilting and foldable bike hitch carriers, with the most recent model that can handle the most weight being the Lockable Hitch Mount Platform 2.0 Bike Carrier at $259.99 shipped. Coming down from its full $450 price tag, this rate first appeared in November and has since been repeating a few times through December’s holiday season, with the price otherwise having kept at $300 or $400 with discounts. You’re not only getting another chance at the best price we have tracked, but also the first 2026 opportunity here, saving you $190 on a bike carrier for your vehicle that can carry up to 200 pounds (so e-bike transport is best supported here). There’s also the brand’s first-generation platform style carrier that can hold up to 150 pounds at its low of $169.99 shipped, while the second-generation hanging style carrier that holds up to 165 pounds and up to four bikes is also at its low of $159.99 shipped.

more…

items.title: Former CEO of celeb fav gym Dogpound launches $5M fund to back wellness companies
items.summary: Jenny Liu is a solo first-time GP looking to back underrepresented wellness founders.

items.title: Apple’s most affordable 13-inch M5 iPad Pro hits some of the best prices yet, now nearly $150 off
items.summary:
While we did catch some notable price drops on Apple’s latest M5-powered iPad Pro lineup over Black Friday and the holidays last year, many of the deepest offers landed on the (more) niche high-end configurations. Today, however, Amazon is serving up some of its best prices ever on the most affordable 13-inch models at nearly $150 off.

items.title: Get 2-in-1 long-reaching functionality with Greenworks’ 24V cordless polesaw + pole hedge trimmer combo at $213
items.summary:
Amazon is currently offering the Greenworks 24V 10-inch Cordless Polesaw + 20-inch Pole Hedge Trimmer Combo with 4.0Ah battery at $212.67 shipped, beating out its direct website pricing by $87. This combo kit usually goes for a $300 MSRP direct from the brand, however, at Amazon, we’ve been seeing it start lower between $261 and $251 since August, with discounts having gone as low as $200, last seen during the first week of November. You’re looking at a $48 markdown from the highest of the more recent going rates ($87 off the MSRP), landing it at the third-best price we have tracked, which is only $13 above the low and $3 above the second-lowest price.

more…

items.title: Ditch your bulky power bank while this wildly thin 10K aluminum model with built-in USB-C cable is down to $25
items.summary:
LISEN 10,000mAh slim power bank with built-in USB-C cable

Buy for $25 (Reg. $40)

What we love

This LISEN power bank measures just half an inch in thickness while still packing a 10,000mAh battery. It includes a built-in braided USB-C cable that doubles as a lanyard, so you don’t need to carry an extra wire. There’s no wireless charging, but you get reliable wired speeds up to 22.5W, plus a small display for battery status.

items.title: Struggling fusion power company General Fusion to go public via $1B reverse merger
